programme.title: American troops in Haiti
programme.short_synopsis: American intervention in Haiti, Clinton's motivations, and Jimmy Carter's diplomacy.
programme.medium_synopsis: As American troops enter Haiti, Alistair Cooke chronicles President Clinton's motivations for intervening in the conflict and explains Jimmy Carter's role in the negotiations.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
